historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 43-1525.

1973 Ed., § 1520d.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2413.01.

Miscellaneous Notes

Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 304 of D.C. Law 11- 111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.

DC CODE § 34-2413.09

Current through December 11, 2012
credits: (Oct. 21, 1975, D.C. Law 1-23, title VII, § 701(a), 22 DCR 2114; repealed pursuant to § 302 of D.C. Law 11-111.)

heading.catch_text: Water and water service rates and charges. [Repealed]
